title: #58 - Sean Evans of Hot Ones
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined by the host of the smash hit series Hot Ones- Sean Evans! Together we discuss how he prepares for his interviews, Taco Gate, tragic guests, his iron-clad b-hole, and the whole H3 Podcast crew tries the spiciest hot sauce in the world- The Last Dab with Pepper-X!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
